text:
成功提取貸款，更可享高達HK$8,800現金回贈，貸款額高達HK$100萬！
立即致電富邦財務貸款熱線 3767 6688 申請，並表明使用特選SmarTone客戶優惠。
優惠名額有限，優惠期至2024年12月31日，受條款及細則約束。 詳情請參閱 [redacted_url]
trans:
Successfully extract a loan and enjoy up to HK$8,800 cash rebate, with loan amounts up to HK$1,000,000!
Call Fubon Financial Loan Hotline at 3767 6688 to apply and mention the exclusive SmarTone customer offer.
Limited offer, valid until December 31, 2024, subject to terms and conditions. For more details, please refer to [redacted_url].
